thread.section_title: Moula Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Moula | www.moula.com.au
thread.title: Michael Mulligan

author: Michael Mulligan
title: Michael Mulligan
text: Normally I have to deal with a long application process when applying for a loan as the Trustee of a Trust, Moula make that just a small step in a very quick application. They get that small business owners don't have the time to fill out long applications and then wait a month for it to process. Plus everything is available to view in their user friendly web interface.
